sections.title: Build healthy relationships and communication
sections.description: Interpersonal effectiveness helps you navigate relationships with confidence and clarity. These skills teach you how to communicate your needs, set boundaries, resolve conflicts, and maintain self-respect while building meaningful connections with others.

skills.title: DEAR MAN
skills.description: A structured approach for effective communication: Describe the situation, Express your feelings, Assert your needs, Reinforce the benefits, stay Mindful, Appear confident, and Negotiate when needed.

skills.title: FAST
skills.description: Maintain self-respect in interactions: be Fair, avoid unnecessary Apologies, Stick to your values, and be Truthful.

skills.title: GIVE
skills.description: Maintain relationships while asking for what you need: be Gentle, show Interest, Validate others, and use an Easy manner.

skills.title: Interpersonal Goals
skills.description: Identify and prioritize your goals in interpersonal situations.

skills.title: THINK
skills.description: Consider if your approach is True, Helpful, Inspiring, Necessary, and Kind.

skills.title: Validating Others
skills.description: Learn to acknowledge and validate other people's experiences and emotions.

keepLearning.title: Keep Learning!
keepLearning.description: Complete skills to earn leaves and grow your tree. Each completed skill gives you 5 leaves! üçÉ
